response.overview: The 2025 Night of Champions is an upcoming professional wrestling event produced by WWE. It will be the 11th Night of Champions and will take place on Saturday, June 28, 2025, at the Kingdom Arena in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. The event will air via pay-per-view (PPV) and livestreaming and feature wrestlers from the promotion's Raw and SmackDown brand divisions.  This will be second consecutive Night of Champions to take place in Saudi Arabia and the 13th event that WWE will hold in Saudi Arabia under a 10-year partnership in support of Saudi Vision 2030.
response.title: WWE Night of Champions 2025
